reviewText:
Kendell Hogan is the best.  His perfect form, execution and impeccable cuing guide you through.  This routine is short, yet very effective.  Kendell's friendly and upbeat personality keeps you moving and motivated.

A wonderful addition to your video library.  Yeah, I know it's VHS.  Don't let that stop you from owning this awesome workout.  Just transfer it into DVD format and keep it movin'!

The Body Dome is no longer in production,  but you can still get it from some sellers.  If not, there are similar products that this video routine can easily be used with.
